item.title: Fridge/freezer, 16th November

item.title: Remains of burnt car on roadway, 16th November
item.description:
A car burnt down here recently and was only partially cleaned. There are pieces of burnt car seat and body cluttering the side of the roadway, (at the point where the bridge starts when driving east, and where I would usually cycle. The road surface on the bridge is also potholder and uneven and because this is the only part of St Asaph Road which doesn’t have parked cars, it is used for fast overtaking, so having pieces of clutter in the road is particularly dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Asaph Road, Nunhead, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet, slippery leaves on the road and pavement outside 46 Great Thrift, 16th November
item.description:

item.title: RTC Debris, 16th November
item.description:
